Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-4317 affecting package postgresql for versions less than 16.3-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-4317 affecting package postgresql for versions less than 16.3-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package postgresql is earlier than 16.3-1, affected by CVE-2024-4317
